snippet: On Thursday, the American chapter of the International Association of Art Critics announced the winner of its annual AICA Awards honoring artists, curators and institutions for excellence in art exhibitions in 2011.
abstract: On Thursday, the American chapter of the International Association of Art Critics announced the winner of its annual AICA Awards honoring artists, curators and institutions for excellence in art exhibitions in 2011.

headline.main: Art Critics' Association Announces Awards for Best Shows of 2011
